text:
Amal Clooney (née Alamuddin;; born 3 February 1978) is a Lebanese-British lawyer. Her works focused in international law and human rights.
Her clients include Julian Assange, the founder of WikiLeaks, the former prime minister of Ukraine, Yulia Tymoshenko; Egyptian-Canadian journalist Mohamed Fahmy; and Nobel Prize laureate Nadia Murad.
In 2019, Clooney was appointed the special envoy on media freedom by the British Foreign and Commonwealth Office.
